text: Akberdino () is a rural locality (a selo) and the administrative center of Akberdinsky Selsoviet, Iglinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 1,009 as of 2010. There are 67 streets. == Geography == It is located 55 km from Iglino. == References == Category:Rural localities in Iglinsky District
title: Akberdino
